pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 2.5 - 3, 4.5 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Neutral     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Warm Oceans, Oceans $(br)> $(n)Trust:$() Raw Cod, Raw Salmon $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Players$() who swim with a $(thing)Dolphin$() receive a $(thing)Dolphin's Grace$() effect. $(thing)Dolphins$() play with dropped items. When they are fed $(item)Raw Cod$() or $(item)Raw Salmon$(), they swim to the nearest structure or buried treasure.
$(n)Drops:$() 0-1 Raw Cod, 0-1 Cooked Cod if killed with fire  $(n)XP:$() 1-3
